casebody.data:
Olney T. Inman v. E. T. Mears. R. Haines Passmore v. E. T. Mears. No. 15,373. No. 15,374. (94 Pac. 136.)

(94 Pac. 136.)

Error from Montgomery district court; Thomas J. Flannelly, judge. Opinion filed February 8, 1908. Reversed. Archie D. Neale, for plaintiffs in error. J. B. Ziegler, for defendant in error. Per Curiam:

These cases were submitted with Wilkinson v. Mears, ante, p. 273, and present the same questions. For the reasons given in the opinion in that case the judgments are reversed, and the causes remanded for new trials.
